GSD36narads_u:230: NM3.2c/ bruvāṇas tv anyathā sabhyas tad eva-ubhayam āpnuyāt // 2
GSD36narads_u:231: NM3.3a/ rājā tu dhārmikān sabhyān niyuñjyāt suparīkṣitān /
GSD36narads_u:232: NM3.3c/ vyavahāradhuraṃ voḍhuṃ ye śaktāḥ sadgavā iva // 3

GSD36narads_u:236: NM3.5c/ saha sadbhir ato rājā vyavahārān viśodhayet // 5
GSD36narads_u:237: NM3.6a/ śuddheṣu vyavahāreṣu śuddhiṃ yānti sabhāsadaḥ /

GSD36narads_u:239: NM3.7a/ yatra dharmo hy adharmeṇa satyaṃ yatrānṛtena ca /
GSD36narads_u:240: NM3.7c/ hanyate prekṣamāṇānāṃ hatās tatra sabhāsadaḥ // 7

GSD36narads_u:243: NM3.9a/ sabhā vā na praveṣṭavyā vaktavyaṃ vā samañjasam /
GSD36narads_u:244: NM3.9c/ abruvan vibruvan vāpi naro bhavati kilbiṣī // 9
GSD36narads_u:245: NM3.10a/ ye tu sabhyāḥ sabhāṃ gatvā tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyanta āsate /
GSD36narads_u:246: NM3.10c/ yathāprāptaṃ na bruvate sarve te 'anṛtavādinaḥ // 10

GSD36narads_u:248: NM3.11c/ pādaḥ sabhāsadaḥ sarvān pādo rājānam ṛcchati // 11
GSD36narads_u:249: NM3.12a/ rājā bhavaty anenās tu mucyante ca sabhāsadaḥ /
GSD36narads_u:250: NM3.12c/ eno gacchati kartāraṃ nindārho yatra nindyate // 12
GSD36narads_u:251: NM3.13a/ andho matsyān ivāśnāti nirapekṣaḥ sakaṇṭakān /
GSD36narads_u:252: NM3.13c/ parokṣam arthavaikalyād bhāṣate yaḥ sabhāṃ gataḥ // 13
GSD36narads_u:253: NM3.14a/ tasmāt sabhyaḥ sabhāṃ prāpya rāgadveṣavivarjitaḥ /
GSD36narads_u:254: NM3.14c/ vacas tathāvidhaṃ brūyād yathā na narakaṃ patet // 14

GSD36narads_u:259: NM3.17a/ na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhā / vṛddhā na te ye na vadanti dharmam /
GSD36narads_u:260: NM3.17c/ nāsau dharmo yatra na satyam asti / na tat satyaṃ yac chalenānuviddham
GSD36narads_u:264: N1.01a/ ṛṇaṃ deyam adeyaṃ ca yena yatra yathā ca yat /
GSD36narads_u:265: N1.01c/ dānagrahaṇadharmāc ca ṛṇādānam iti smṛtam // 1
GSD36narads_u:266: N1.02a/ pitary uparate putrā ṛṇaṃ dadyur yathāṃśataḥ /
GSD36narads_u:267: N1.02c/ vibhaktā hy avibhaktā vā yas tām udvahate dhuram // 2
GSD36narads_u:268: N1.03a/ pitṛvyeṇāvibhaktena bhrātrā vā yad ṛṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSD36narads_u:269: N1.03c/ mātrā vā yat kuṭumbārthe dadyus tad rikthino 'akhilam // 3
GSD36narads_u:270: N1.04a/ kramād avyāhataṃ prāptaṃ putrair yan narṇam uddhṛtam /
GSD36narads_u:271: N1.04c/ dadyuḥ paitāmahaṃ pautrās tac caturthān nivartate // 4
GSD36narads_u:272: N1.05a/ icchanti pitaraḥ putrān svārthahetor yatas tataḥ /
GSD36narads_u:274: N1.06a/ ataḥ putreṇa jātena svārtham utsṛjya yatnataḥ /
GSD36narads_u:275: N1.06c/ pitā mokṣitavya ṛṇād yathā na narakaṃ patet // 6
GSD36narads_u:276: N1.07a/ tapasvī cāgnihotrī ca ṛṇavān mriyate yadi /
GSD36narads_u:277: N1.07c/ tapaś caivāgnihotraṃ ca sarvaṃ tad dhanināṃ dhanam // 7
GSD36narads_u:278: N1.08a/ na putrarṇaṃ pitā dadyād dadyāt putras tu paitṛkam /
GSD36narads_u:280: N1.09a/ pitur eva niyogād yat kuṭumbabharaṇāya ca /
GSD36narads_u:281: N1.09c/ kṛtaṃ vā yad ṛṇaṃ kṛcchre dadyāt putrasya tat pitā // 9
GSD36narads_u:283: N1.10c/ kuṭumbahetor utkṣiptaṃ voḍhavyaṃ tat kuṭumbinā // 10
GSD36narads_u:284: N1.11a/ nārvāg viṃśatimād varṣāt pitari proṣite sutaḥ /
GSD36narads_u:285: N1.11c/ ṛṇaṃ dadyāt pitṛvye vā jyeṣṭhe bhrātary athāpi vā // 11
GSD36narads_u:286: N1.12a/ dāpyaḥ pararṇam eko 'api jīvatsv adhikṛtaiḥ kṛtam /
GSD36narads_u:287: N1.12c/ preteṣu tu na tatputraḥ pararṇaṃ dātum arhati // 12
GSD36narads_u:288: N1.13a/ na strī patikṛtaṃ dadyād ṛṇaṃ putrakṛtaṃ tathā /
GSD36narads_u:289: N1.13c/ abhyupetād ṛte yadvā saha patyā kṛtaṃ bhavet // 13
GSD36narads_u:290: N1.14a/ dadyād aputrā vidhavā niyuktā yā mumūrṣuṇā /
GSD36narads_u:291: N1.14c/ yo vā tadriktham ādadyād yato riktham ṛṇaṃ tataḥ // 14
GSD36narads_u:292: N1.15a/ na ca bhāryākṛtam ṛṇaṃ kathaṃcit patyur ābhavet /
GSD36narads_u:293: N1.15c/ āpatkṛtād ṛte puṃsāṃ kuṭumbārtho hi vistaraḥ // 15
GSD36narads_u:295: N1.16c/ teṣāṃ tatpratyayā vṛttiḥ kuṭumbaṃ ca tadāśrayam // 16
GSD36narads_u:296: N1.17a/ putriṇī tu samutsṛjya putraṃ strī yānyam āśrayet /
GSD36narads_u:297: N1.17c/ ṛkthaṃ tasyā haret sarvaṃ niḥsvāyāḥ putra eva tu // 17
GSD36narads_u:298: N1.18a/ yā tu sapradhanaiva strī sāpatyā cānyam āśrayet /
GSD36narads_u:299: N1.18c/ so 'asyā dadyād ṛṇaṃ bhartur utsṛjed vā tathaiva tām // 18
GSD36narads_u:300: N1.19a/ adhanasya hy aputrasya mṛtasyopaiti yaḥ striyam /
GSD36narads_u:301: N1.19c/ ṛṇaṃ voḍhuḥ sa bhajate tad evāsya dhanaṃ smṛtam // 19
GSD36narads_u:302: N1.20a/ dhanastrīhāriputrāṇām ṛṇabhāg yo dhanaṃ haret /
GSD36narads_u:304: N1.21a/ uttamā svairiṇī yā syād uttamā ca punarbhuvām /
GSD36narads_u:305: N1.21c/ ṛṇaṃ tayoḥ patikṛtaṃ dadyād yas tām upāśnute // 21
GSD36narads_u:306: N1.22a/ strīkṛtāny apramāṇāni kāryāṇy āhur anāpadi /
GSD36narads_u:308: N1.23a/ etāny api pramāṇāni bhartā yady anumanyate /
GSD36narads_u:309: N1.23c/ putraḥ patyur abhāve vā rājā vā patiputrayoḥ // 23
GSD36narads_u:310: N1.24a/ bhartrā prītena yad dattaṃ striyai tasmin mṛte 'api tat /
GSD36narads_u:311: N1.24c/ sā yathākāmam aśnīyād dadyād vā sthāvarād ṛte // 24
GSD36narads_u:312: N1.25a/ tathā dāsakṛtaṃ kāryam akṛtaṃ paricakṣate /
GSD36narads_u:313: N1.25c/ anyatra svāmisaṃdeśān na dāsaḥ prabhur ātmanaḥ // 25
GSD36narads_u:314: N1.26a/ putreṇa ca kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yat syāt pitur anicchataḥ /
GSD36narads_u:315: N1.26c/ tad apy akṛtam evāhur dāsaḥ putraś ca tau samau // 26
GSD36narads_u:316: N1.27a/ aprāptavyavahāraś cet svatantro 'api hi na rṇabhāk /
GSD36narads_u:317: N1.27c/ svātantryaṃ tu smṛtaṃ jyeṣṭhe jyaiṣṭhyaṃ guṇavayaḥkṛtam // 27
GSD36narads_u:318: N1.28a/ trayaḥ svatantrā loke 'asmin rājācāryas tathaiva ca /
GSD36narads_u:319: N1.28c/ prati prati ca varṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ svagṛhe gṛhī // 28
GSD36narads_u:320: N1.29a/ asvatantrāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ svatantraḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ /
GSD36narads_u:321: N1.29c/ asvatantraḥ smṛtaḥ śiṣya ācārye tu svatantratā // 29
GSD36narads_u:322: N1.30a/ asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ putrā dāsāś ca saparigrahāḥ /
GSD36narads_u:323: N1.30c/ svatantras tatra tu gṛhī yasya yat syāt kramāgatam // 30
GSD36narads_u:324: N1.31a/ garbhasthaiḥ sadṛśo jñeya ā varṣād aṣṭamāc chiṣuḥ /
GSD36narads_u:325: N1.31c/ bāla ā ṣoḍaśāj jñeyaḥ pogaṇḍaś cāpi śabdyate // 31
GSD36narads_u:326: N1.32a/ parato vyavahārajñaḥ svatantraḥ pitarau vinā /
GSD36narads_u:327: N1.32c/ jīvator asvatantraḥ syāj jarayāpi samanvitaḥ // 32
GSD36narads_u:328: N1.33a/ tayor api pitā śreyān bījaprādhānyadarśanāt /

GSD36narads_u:330: N1.34a/ svatantrāḥ sarva evaite paratantreṣu sarvadā /
GSD36narads_u:331: N1.34c/ anuśiṣṭau visarge ca vikraye ceśvarā matāḥ // 34
GSD36narads_u:332: N1.35a/ yad bālaḥ kurute kāryam asvatantras tathaiva ca /
GSD36narads_u:333: N1.35c/ akṛtaṃ tad iti prāhuḥ śāstre śāstravido janāḥ // 35
GSD36narads_u:334: N1.36a/ svatantro 'api hi yat kāryaṃ kuryād aprakṛtiṃ gataḥ /
GSD36narads_u:335: N1.36c/ tad apy akṛtam evāhur asvatantraḥ sa hetutaḥ // 36

GSD36narads_u:338: N1.38a/ kule jyeṣṭhas tathā śreṣṭhaḥ prakṛtisthaś ca yo bhavet /
GSD36narads_u:339: N1.38c/ tatkṛtaṃ syāt kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ nāsvatantrakṛtaṃ kṛtam // 38
GSD36narads_u:340: N1.39a/ dhanamūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā yatnas tatsādhane mataḥ /
GSD36narads_u:341: N1.39c/ rakṣaṇaṃ vardhanaṃ bhoga iti tasya vidhiḥ kramāt // 39
GSD36narads_u:342: N1.40a/ tat punas trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ śuklaṃ śabalam eva ca /
GSD36narads_u:343: N1.40c/ kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasya vijñeyaḥ prabhedaḥ saptadhā pṛthak // 40
GSD36narads_u:345: N1.41c/ dhanaṃ saptavidhaṃ śuklam udayo 'apy asya tadvidhaḥ // 41
GSD36narads_u:347: N1.42c/ kṛtopakārād āptaṃ ca śabalaṃ samudāhṛtam // 42
GSD36narads_u:349: N1.43c/ vyājenopārjitaṃ yac ca tat kṛṣṇaṃ samudāhṛtam // 43
GSD36narads_u:350: N1.44a/ tena krayo vikrayaś ca dānaṃ grahaṇam eva ca /
GSD36narads_u:351: N1.44c/ vividhāś ca pravartante kriyāḥ saṃbhoga eva ca // 44
GSD36narads_u:352: N1.45a/ yathāvidhena dravyeṇa yatkiṃcit kurute naraḥ /
GSD36narads_u:353: N1.45c/ tathāvidham avāpnoti sa phalaṃ pretya ceha ca // 45
GSD36narads_u:354: N1.46a/ tat punar dvādaśavidhaṃ prativarṇāśrayāt smṛtam /
GSD36narads_u:355: N1.46c/ sādhāraṇaṃ syāt trividhaṃ śeṣaṃ navavidhaṃ smṛtam // 46
GSD36narads_u:356: N1.47a/ kramāgataṃ prītidāyaḥ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā /
GSD36narads_u:357: N1.47c/ aviśeṣeṇa varṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ trividhaṃ dhanam // 47

GSD36narads_u:361: N1.49c/ yuddhopalabdhaṃ kāraś ca daṇḍaś ca vyavahārataḥ // 49
GSD36narads_u:362: N1.50a/ vaiśeṣikaṃ dhanaṃ jñeyaṃ vaiśyasyāpi trilakṣaṇam /
GSD36narads_u:364: N1.51a/ sarveṣām eva varṇānām eṣa dharmyo dhanāgamaḥ /
GSD36narads_u:365: N1.51c/ viparyayād adharmyaḥ syān na ced āpad garīyasī // 51

GSD36narads_u:367: N1.52c/ vaiśyavṛttis tataś coktā na jaghanyā kathaṃcana // 52

GSD36narads_u:369: N1.53c/ vṛṣalaḥ karma na brāhmaṃ patanīye hi te tayoḥ // 53
GSD36narads_u:370: N1.54a/ utkṛṣṭaṃ cāpakṛṣṭaṃ ca tayoḥ karma na vidyate /
GSD36narads_u:371: N1.54c/ madhyame karmaṇī hitvā sarvasādhāraṇe hi te // 54
GSD36narads_u:372: N1.55a/ āpadaṃ brāhmaṇas tīrtvā kṣatravṛttyā hṛtair dhanaiḥ /
GSD36narads_u:373: N1.55c/ utsṛjet kṣatravṛttiṃ tāṃ kṛtvā pāvanam ātmanaḥ // 55
GSD36narads_u:374: N1.56a/ tasyām eva tu yo vṛttau brāhmaṇo ramate rasāt /
GSD36narads_u:375: N1.56c/ kāṇḍapṛṣṭhaś cyuto mārgāt so 'apāṅkteyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // 56
GSD36narads_u:376: N1.57a/ vaiśyavṛttāv avikreyaṃ brāhmaṇasya payo dadhi /
GSD36narads_u:382: N1.60a/ brāhmaṇasya tu vikreyaṃ śuṣkaṃ dāru tṛṇāni ca /
GSD36narads_u:384: N1.61a/ svayaṃ śīrṇaṃ ca vidalaṃ phalānāṃ badareṅgude /
GSD36narads_u:385: N1.61c/ rajjuḥ kārpāsikaṃ sūtraṃ tac ced avikṛtaṃ bhavet // 61
GSD36narads_u:386: N1.62a/ aśaktau bheṣajasyārthe yajñahetos tathaiva ca /
GSD36narads_u:387: N1.62c/ yady avaśyaṃ tu vikreyās tilā dhānyena tatsāmāḥ // 62
GSD36narads_u:388: N1.63a/ avikreyāṇi vikrīṇan brāhmaṇaḥ pracyutaḥ pathaḥ /
GSD36narads_u:389: N1.63c/ mārge punar avasthāpya rājñā daṇḍena bhūyasā // 63
GSD36narads_u:391: N1.64c/ sīdanti hi pramāṇāni pramāṇair avyavasthitaiḥ // 64
GSD36narads_u:392: N1.65a/ likhitaṃ sākṣiṇo bhuktiḥ pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtaṃ /
GSD36narads_u:393: N1.65c/ dhanasvīkaraṇe yena dhanī dhanam upāśnute // 65
GSD36narads_u:394: N1.66a/ likhitaṃ balavan nityaṃ jīvantas tv eva sākṣiṇaḥ /
GSD36narads_u:395: N1.66c/ kālātiharaṇād bhuktir iti śāstreṣu niścayaḥ // 66
GSD36narads_u:397: N1.67c/ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ guru jñeyaṃ bhuktir ebhyo garīyasī // 67
GSD36narads_u:398: N1.68a/ vidyamāne 'api likhite jīvatsv api hi sākṣiṣu /
GSD36narads_u:399: N1.68c/ viśeṣataḥ sthāvarāṇāṃ yan na bhuktaṃ na tat sthiram // 68
GSD36narads_u:400: N1.69a/ bhujyamānān parair arthān yaḥ svān maurkhyād upekṣate /
GSD36narads_u:401: N1.69c/ samakṣaṃ jīvato 'apy asya tān bhuktiḥ kurute vaśe // 69
GSD36narads_u:402: N1.70a/ yatkiṃcid daśa varṣāṇi saṃnidhau prekṣate dhanī /
GSD36narads_u:403: N1.70c/ bhujyamānaṃ parais tūṣṇīṃ na sa tal labdhum arhati // 70
GSD36narads_u:404: N1.71a/ upekṣāṃ kurvatas tasya tūṣṇīṃ bhūtasya tiṣṭhataḥ /
GSD36narads_u:405: N1.71c/ kāle 'atipanne pūrvokte vyavahāro na sidhyati // 71
GSD36narads_u:406: N1.72a/ ajaḍaś ced apogaṇḍo viṣaye cāsya bhujyate /
GSD36narads_u:407: N1.72c/ bhuktaṃ tad vyavahāreṇa bhoktā tad dhanam arhati // 72
GSD36narads_u:408: N1.73a/ ādhiḥ sīmā bāladhanaṃ nikṣepopanidhī striyaḥ /
GSD36narads_u:409: N1.73c/ rājasvaṃ śrotriyasvaṃ ca nopabhogena jīryate // 73
GSD36narads_u:410: N1.74a/ pratyakṣaparibhogāc ca svāmino dvidaśāḥ samāḥ /
GSD36narads_u:411: N1.74c/ ādhyādīny api jīryante strīnarendradhanād ṛte // 74
GSD36narads_u:412: N1.75a/ strīdhanaṃ ca narendrāṇāṃ na kadācana jīryate /
GSD36narads_u:413: N1.75c/ anāgamaṃ bhujyamānaṃ vatsarāṇāṃ śatair api // 75
GSD36narads_u:414: N1.76a/ nirbhogo yatra dṛśyeta na dṛśyetāgamaḥ kvacit /
GSD36narads_u:415: N1.76c/ āgamaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra na bhogas tatra kāraṇam // 76

GSD36narads_u:634: N1.184a/ nagare pratiruddhaḥ san bahirdvāre bubhukṣitaḥ /

GSD36narads_u:646: N1.190a/ hanti jātān ajātāṃś ca hiraṇyārthe 'anṛtaṃ vadan /

GSD36narads_u:648: N1.191a/ ekam evādvitīyaṃ tat prāhuḥ pāvanam ātmanaḥ /
GSD36narads_u:649: N1.191c/ satyaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ pārāvārasya naur iva //

GSD36narads_u:664: N1.199a/ śūlair bhetsyanti cākruddhāḥ krośantam aparāyaṇam /
GSD36narads_u:665: N1.199c/ avākśirasam utkṣipya kṣepsyanty agnihradeṣu ca //

GSD36narads_u:696: N1.215a/ codanā pratikālaṃ ca yuktileśas tathaiva ca /

GSD36narads_u:714: N1.224a/ gūhamānas tu daurātmyād yadi pāpaṃ sa jīyate /

GSD36narads_u:717: N2.01a/ svadravyaṃ yatra viśrambhān nikṣipaty aviśaṅkitaḥ /

GSD36narads_u:797: N5.04c/ jātikarmakṛtas tūkto viśeṣo vṛttir eva ca //
GSD36narads_u:798: N5.05a/ karmāpi dvividhaṃ jñeyam aśubhaṃ śubham eva ca /

GSD36narads_u:802: N5.07a/ iṣṭataḥ svāminaś cāṅgair upasthānam athāntataḥ /
GSD36narads_u:803: N5.07c/ aśubhaṃ karma vijñeyaṃ śubham anyad ataḥ param //
GSD36narads_u:804: N5.08a/ ā vidyāgrahaṇāc chiṣyaḥ śuśrūṣet prayato gurum /
GSD36narads_u:805: N5.08c/ tadvṛttir gurudāreṣu guruputre tathaiva ca //

GSD36narads_u:810: N5.11a/ yathākālam adhīyīta yāvan na vimanā guruḥ /

GSD36narads_u:824: N5.18a/ śikṣito 'api kṛtaṃ kālam antevāsī samāpnuyāt /

GSD36narads_u:1090: N12.1a/ vivāhādividhiḥ strīṇāṃ yatra puṃsāṃ ca kīrtyate /

GSD36narads_u:1110: N12.11a/ caturdaśavidhaḥ śāstre sa tu dṛṣṭo manīṣibhiḥ /
GSD36narads_u:1111: N12.11c/ cikitsyaś cācikitsyaś ca teṣām ukto vidhiḥ kramāt //

GSD36narads_u:1133: N12.22c/ anujñayā tasya varaṃ pratītya varayet svayam //

GSD36narads_u:1138: N12.25a/ kanyā nartum upekṣeta bāndhavebhyo nivedayet /

GSD36narads_u:1147: N12.29c/ guṇāpekṣaṃ bhaved dānam āsurādiṣu ca triṣu //

GSD36narads_u:1249: N12.80c/ putre jāte nivarteta viplavaḥ syād ato 'anyathā //
